description:
A village helps a monk escape the wrath of a fuedal lord.  A goddess turns leaves into fish to help her people.  A high priest comes to the village.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Hornless Sazae / The Willowleaf Fish / The High Priest Who Came to the Village
Tsunonashi Saze / Yanagi no Ha no Sakana / Mura ni Kita Daisoujou-sama
つのなしさざえ / 柳の葉の魚 / 村に来た大僧正さま
